description: Institute of Ocean Sciences has a requirement for an LPG engine powered forklift that is to replace an existing 1982 model V60C Caterpillar forklift.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Project Title and Description

* **English Title**: Procurement of a Forklift for the Institute of Ocean Sciences
* **French Title**: Approvisionnement d'un chariot élévateur pour le Centre des sciences de l'océan

The Institute of Ocean Sciences seeks a new LPG engine powered forklift to replace an existing 1982 model V60C Caterpillar forklift, which is no longer operational.

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number** (Número de sollicitation): WS3793942778
* **Publication Date** (Date de publication): January 24, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time** (Date et heure de clôture de l'appel d'offres): February 13, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Bidder Notice URL** (URL de l'avis aux soumissionnaires): [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15206300?extsite=MTUyMDYzMDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15206300?extsite=MTUyMDYzMDBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Contact Information**: 
	+ **English Contact**:
		- Name: Kristina Mikulova
		- Email: <kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
		- Phone: (no number provided)
	+ **French Contact**:
		- Name: Kristina Mikulova
		- Email: <kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
		- Phone: (no number provided)

### Procurement Information

* **Direction/Ministère**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* **Location/Territoire/département**: British Columbia / Colombie-Britannique
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Award Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) / Accord de libre échange canadien (ALEC)

### Addenda

The tender closing date is February 13,
